title: Cross-biz isolation under marketplace/enterprise flow Snapshot

view.title: Cross-biz isolation under marketplace/enterprise flow
view.subtitle: Marketplace/cross-biz isolation enforced for non-member adversary.

blocks.title: Adversary Marketplace Tenant Isolation completed
blocks.message: Marketplace/cross-biz isolation enforced for non-member adversary.

resultPayload.note: Marketplace/cross-biz isolation enforced for non-member adversary.
Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.

resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.
